label: 藤原李綱
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?-before 1102). Son of Sanenori. President of the court university. Suetsuna setsuin 李綱切韻 (Suetsuna's Rhyming Dictionary," lost). Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩(16), and Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集(4). Prose compositions in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋 and Chōya gunsai. Participated in the Jishin shiawase (1151). [実範、漢詩、朝野群載、侍臣詩合] "
